name: Shoot Up!!!
description:
Shoot Up and Up !!!
Please Do Not Play at work, it's a Super Addictive game EVER.
Very simple, just Avoid Whites. Other Colors are Friends ;)
Easy to play, Hold and Slide to shoot and control.
Key Features:
- Addictive game ever in 3D
- Super cool in-game features
- Awesome colors and graphics
- Nice Physics
- Smooth gameplay
- Various shapes and obstacles
